author: Gaceliya91

text:
I saw the new Silent Hill movie yesterday since I'm a fan of the games and I actually liked the first one. I saw the 6% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and prepared for the worst, but I genuinely liked it (even if it has a list of flaws). I guess it confirms I tend to agree a lot more with IMDB's user ratings.

This is one﻿ of the series' most iconic themes. A simple but haunting piano melody.
author: SupraDarky
